Posts.Content: well hello feline are fab, i,m so sorry you are short of support, there is help out there sweetheart, you need someone who will listen, groups are great but gen it people going through treatment,i,m sure there must be support groups for listening to help others i know that's where i would be looking, also if your not happy with the breast care nurse   change to another there are many nurses.i,m sure you would find someone.   you belong to this group and i will always listen to you are you from uk, i,m 62yrs female  i have many illnesses including inoperable brain tumour, i don't get my words out correctly at times but i will always be here if you need to talkso don't feel despair  we care and i cant answer all your questions   but you have choose to open up which is the main thing other will also join in with me too i,m sure, where are you with your treatment  and when is your next appt also what is the main thing that is worrying you,?not everyone has a partner or family  but that is why they turn to these groups. i,m cee from Lincoln area   so come on open up and let me know what is scaring you i,m a gd listener   answer to you sweetheart sending you a big cyber hug cee
Posts.Title: Felinesarefab: All alone etc.
